topics.body:
So I may be moving to California in the summer.

Short version is I've had enough of my current college's shit and I'm done with this college.

I'm currently looking at cheap ass colleges that have low tuition rates for out of state students so that a year in I can qualify for residency and stay there without having to worry about being forced to go back to this college.
